subject: CHANGE OF BENEFICIARY
body:
CHANGE OF BENEFICIARY
 In Our office  Was  A Presence Of One Mr.  Shem Pullen of 1011 128TH
ST SW  APT C104   Everett, WA 98204 with his ID attached .filing
application contrary to your pending fund transfer. The above
mentioned person visited this Bank yesterday with a power of attorney
given in his favor by your good self, granting him the benefit to
process and claim your inheritance of $5,000,000.00( Five Million
United States Dollars Only) for personal reasons.
A.s.a.p
Thanks and God Bless,
Mr Godwin Emefiele .
Central Bank Governor
You Can Reach me On this Line
Email:e389852@gmail.com

subject: Re: CHANGE OF BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello Mr. Godwin Emefiele,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm a bit surprised by this information as I don't recall giving any power of attorney to Mr. Shem Pullen. Could you please provide more details about this situation? When and where was this power of attorney supposedly given?

I would also like to know more about the pending fund transfer you mentioned. How did it come about and why is it in my name? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jodi
